name: Adventurers & Monsters vs. the Machines
description:
A normal dungeoneering expedition goes wrong when the dungeon is invaded by robots! The adventurers and monsters must join together to take on this threat. Will they be able to put aside their differences to work together?

Turn based combat with special abilities, and a twist: your enemy in one encounter may be your friend the next!

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021, my first ever! The theme was "joined together."

Attributions (Google Sheets)

Known issues

If all team members die, the game will fade to black then freeze.  Just force quit and restart the game. Unfortunately it won't save your progress, think of it like a roguelike!
